interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 24bio Hair Growth Supplement/ Get Results Or Money Back Guarantee/ Hair Care Supplement For Men And Women/ May Stimulate Hair Growth & Thicken Hair/ Full of Biotin, Amla Extract, M.S.M & More Review Date: 2020/07/14 Store: 24bio Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': '24bio', 'Item Form': 'Capsules', 'Material Type Free': 'Gluten Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.17 x 2.13 x 1.89 inches; 2.65 Ounces', 'Department': 'Unisex-adult', 'UPC': '869539000475', 'Manufacturer': 'NutraScience'} Review Text: I had high hopes when I ordered these pills. Since this quarantine I've decided to let my hair grow and thanks to the wonders of getting older I've noticed I have some thinning at the top of my head (around the crown).

When these pills arrived first thing I noticed was the smell. They smell horrible - like old cabbage. But I learned to never judge a book by it's cover. I decided to take anyway.

I've been taking for a little over 2 weeks as my hair has grown, but I don't know if it's just natural growth. My hair has filled in somewhat in the thinning areas but I think this is what it would have done anyway. I will continue to take and update my review if my beard / head hair fills in.

Pros
Good quantity

Cons
Not sure if it works
Smells horrible - like old cabbage Review Title: Had high hopes, not sure if it really works. Smells like old cabbage Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Isshah Stainless Steel Metal Tongue Scraper Cleaner - Get Rid of Bad Breath and Bacteria - Pack of 4 - Eco Friendly Packaging Isshah {'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 3.74 x 0.51 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '778299097277'} I used one of the tongue scrapers this morning and let me say.. It's life changing. It felt like I just learned how to brush my teeth.

I've never used a tongue scraper before but it was recommended by my Dentist maybe a year ago. I thought I was good by just brushing it with my Electric Toothbrush as I've always done it. Using it this morning!!! It was like an epiphany. I can see how this helps exponentially with your oral hygiene. I honestly felt like a fool after seeing the results and realize this was what I was missing out on for many years.

The items come in a box, you take one out, sterilize it and all you do is place over your tongue, apply pressure and pull down. You will be surprised at what you see removed from the back of your tongue to the front. I was taken back.

I honestly don't know how I could have lived this long without using one of these. I think I will buy one for all of my family. I feel like I done dental hygiene wrong all my life Bloomy Essentials Organic Lemon Essential Oil 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - Great for Household Cleaner & Laundry - 100% Pure Bloomy Essentials {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 2.52 x 1.06 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084635', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} I have a diffuser that I use every single day. I m always looking for different oils and scents to use to liven up my place. I saw this and figured why not, give it a try..

I'm glad I did. This is literally the MOST natural lemon smelling scent I have ever used. When using in a diffuser you won't need much, just a few drops. If you buy this you won't regret it. I've had it for over a week and I'm pretty pleased with it. A little does go a long way.

Pros

Smells very good
No weird after smell

Cons

Not really much of it..
Bottle is pretty small. I'm impressed by this Essential Lemon Oil Manicure Set, 14pcs Pedicure Kit, Nail Clippers, Professional Grooming Kit with Black Luxurious Leather Travel Case for Men Women EASTBUDDY {'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 3.4 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} My stepmother gave me a personal grooming kit almost 20 years ago. It did not have all the things this kit had, but nevertheless I still have and treasure that kit as my Stepmom has since passed away. It's something I keep and remember her by.

This kit is like the 3.0 version of what she gave me. It even has some items I'm not sure of the use.

As soon as I opened it, it became useful. Oftentimes I'm sitting at my desk for super long periods of the day and oftentimes I may start biting my nails or even cleaning my ears as I'm looking at my computer screens. This kit allows me to clip my nails without having to run to the bathroom and grab my mother's kit. The tools in this kit allows it to be a one stop shop so that means it has a permanent place near my office desk. You can't go wrong getting this.

Pros
Fairly Compact
Portable
Many tools
Stainless steel
It has the ear scraper / cleaner.. That makes it a winner right there.

Cons
Not really any.. I just wish I knew what all the tools were used for. I guess I have to do some researching. profile:
**User Summary:**

This user demonstrates a strong commitment to personal hygiene and well-being, emphasizing high-quality grooming products and effective self-care routines. Their recent exploration of hair care supplements indicates a growing interest in addressing specific grooming concerns, particularly hair growth and thickness, which they have approached with a proactive mindset.

**Key trends in the interaction include:**

- **Preference for Comprehensive Solutions:** The user continues to value multifunctional products, including those that target hair health, aligning with their practical lifestyle.

- **Nostalgic Connections:** Their emotional investment in grooming items persists, showcasing a blend of functionality and sentimentality in their choices.

- **Pragmatic Exploration:** The user remains open to trying diverse grooming and hair care products, reflecting a hands-on attitude towards enhancing their self-care regimen while being mindful of their varying effectiveness.

- **Satisfaction with Functionality:** Despite a recent product not meeting their high expectations, their discerning taste for reliable performance remains evident, highlighting an ongoing pursuit of quality in their grooming tools.

- **Shared Commitment:** The consideration of grooming products’ impact on their daily life indicates a conscientious self-care approach, influenced by personal experiences and family dynamics.

Overall, the user's profile showcases an evolving interest in effective grooming solutions, with a specific focus on hair care, reflecting their commitment to high-quality products that contribute to both personal well-being and efficiency in daily routines.
